verses.verse: דִּבְרֵ֥י <WH1697> The words נְחֶמְיָ֖ה <WH5166> of Nehemiah בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son חֲכַלְיָ֑ה <WH2446> of Hachaliah וַיְהִ֤י <WH1961> happened בְחֹֽדֶשׁ־ <WH2320> And it came to pass in the month [כִּסְלֵו כ] (כִּסְלֵיו֙ <WH3691> Chisleu ק) שְׁנַ֣ת <WH8141> year עֶשְׂרִ֔ים <WH6242> in the twentieth וַאֲנִ֥י <WH589> I הָיִ֖יתִי <WH1961> happened בְּשׁוּשַׁ֥ן <WH7800> as I was in Shushan הַבִּירָֽה׃ <WH1002> the palace

וַיָּבֹ֨א <WH935> came חֲנָ֜נִי <WH2607> That Hanani אֶחָ֧ד <WH259> one מֵאַחַ֛י <WH251> of my brethren ה֥וּא <WH1931> and some וַאֲנָשִׁ֖ים <WH376> men מִֽיהוּדָ֑ה <WH3063> of Judah וָאֶשְׁאָלֵ֞ם <WH7592> and I asked עַל־ <WH5921> concerning הַיְּהוּדִ֧ים <WH3064> them concerning the Jews הַפְּלֵיטָ֛ה <WH6413> that had escaped אֲשֶֽׁר־ <WH834> and נִשְׁאֲר֥וּ <WH7604> which were left מִן־ <WH4480> at הַשֶּׁ֖בִי <WH7628> of the captivity וְעַל־ <WH5921> and about יְרוּשָׁלִָֽם׃ <WH3389> and concerning Jerusalem

וַיֹּאמְרוּ֮ <WH559> And they said לִי֒ הַֽנִּשְׁאָרִ֞ים <WH7604> unto me The remnant אֲשֶֽׁר־ <WH834> who נִשְׁאֲר֤וּ <WH7604> that are left מִן־ <WH4480> at הַשְּׁבִי֙ <WH7628> of the captivity שָׁ֣ם <WH8033> there בַּמְּדִינָ֔ה <WH4082> there in the province בְּרָעָ֥ה <WH7451> affliction גְדֹלָ֖ה <WH1419> [are] in great וּבְחֶרְפָּ֑ה <WH2781> and reproach וְחוֹמַ֤ת <WH2346> the wall יְרוּשָׁלִַ֙ם֙ <WH3389> of Jerusalem מְפֹרָ֔צֶת <WH6555> also [is] broken down וּשְׁעָרֶ֖יהָ <WH8179> and the gates נִצְּת֥וּ <WH3341> thereof are burned בָאֵֽשׁ׃ <WH784> with fire

וַיְהִ֞י <WH1961> become כְּשָׁמְעִ֣י ׀ <WH8085> And it came to pass when I heard אֶת־ <WH853> הַדְּבָרִ֣ים <WH1697> these words הָאֵ֗לֶּה <WH428> these יָשַׁ֙בְתִּי֙ <WH3427> that I sat down וָֽאֶבְכֶּ֔ה <WH1058> and wept וָאֶתְאַבְּלָ֖ה <WH56> and mourned יָמִ֑ים <WH3117> [certain] days וָֽאֱהִ֥י <WH1961> become צָם֙ <WH6684> and fasted וּמִתְפַּלֵּ֔ל <WH6419> and prayed לִפְנֵ֖י <WH6440> before אֱלֹהֵ֥י <WH430> the God הַשָּׁמָֽיִם׃ <WH8064> of heaven

וָאֹמַ֗ר <WH559> And said אָֽנָּ֤א <WH577> I beseech יְהוָה֙ <WH3069> God אֱלֹהֵ֣י <WH430> God הַשָּׁמַ֔יִם <WH8064> of heaven הָאֵ֥ל <WH410> God הַגָּד֖וֹל <WH1419> the great וְהַנּוֹרָ֑א <WH3372> and terrible שֹׁמֵ֤ר <WH8104> that keepeth הַבְּרִית֙ <WH1285> covenant וָחֶ֔סֶד <WH2617> and mercy לְאֹהֲבָ֖יו <WH157> for them that love וּלְשֹׁמְרֵ֥י <WH8104> him and observe מִצְוֹתָֽיו׃ <WH4687> his commandments

תְּהִ֣י <WH1961> become נָ֣א <WH4994> now אָזְנְךָֽ־ <WH241> Let thine ear קַשֶּׁ֣בֶת <WH7183> now be attentive וְֽעֵינֶ֪יךָ <WH5869> and thine eyes פְתֻוּח֟וֹת <WH6605> open לִשְׁמֹ֣עַ <WH8085> that thou mayest hear אֶל־ <WH413> about תְּפִלַּ֣ת <WH8605> the prayer עַבְדְּךָ֡ <WH5650> of thy servant אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which אָנֹכִי֩ <WH595> I מִתְפַּלֵּ֨ל <WH6419> which I pray לְפָנֶ֤יךָ <WH6440> before הַיּוֹם֙ <WH3117> thee now יוֹמָ֣ם <WH3119> day וָלַ֔יְלָה <WH3915> and night עַל־ <WH5921> behalf בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> for the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> of Israel עֲבָדֶ֑יךָ <WH5650> thy servants וּמִתְוַדֶּ֗ה <WH3034> and confess עַל־ <WH5921> behalf חַטֹּ֤אות <WH2403> the sins בְּנֵֽי־ <WH1121> of the children יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <WH3478> of Israel אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which חָטָ֣אנוּ <WH2398> which we have sinned לָ֔ךְ וַאֲנִ֥י <WH589> I וּבֵית־ <WH1004> house אָבִ֖י <WH1> against thee both I and my father's חָטָֽאנוּ׃ <WH2398> have sinned

חֲבֹ֖ל <WH2254> We have dealt very חָבַ֣לְנוּ <WH2254> corruptly לָ֑ךְ וְלֹא־ <WH3808> nor שָׁמַ֣רְנוּ <WH8104> against thee and have not kept אֶת־ <WH853> הַמִּצְוֹ֗ת <WH4687> the commandments וְאֶת־ <WH853> הַֽחֻקִּים֙ <WH2706> nor the statutes וְאֶת־ <WH853> הַמִּשְׁפָּטִ֔ים <WH4941> nor the judgments אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which צִוִּ֖יתָ <WH6680> which thou commandedst אֶת־ <WH853> מֹשֶׁ֥ה <WH4872> Moses עַבְדֶּֽךָ׃ <WH5650> thy servant

זְכָר־ <WH2142> Remember נָא֙ <WH4994> I beseech thee אֶת־ <WH853> הַדָּבָ֔ר <WH1697> I beseech thee the word אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which צִוִּ֛יתָ <WH6680> that thou commandedst אֶת־ <WH853> מֹשֶׁ֥ה <WH4872> Moses עַבְדְּךָ֖ <WH5650> thy servant לֵאמֹ֑ר <WH559> saying אַתֶּ֣ם <WH859> you תִּמְעָ֔לוּ <WH4603> [If] ye transgress אֲנִ֕י <WH589> I אָפִ֥יץ <WH6327> I will scatter you abroad אֶתְכֶ֖ם <WH853> בָּעַמִּֽים׃ <WH5971> among the nations

וְשַׁבְתֶּ֣ם <WH7725> But [if] ye turn אֵלַ֔י <WH413> to me וּשְׁמַרְתֶּם֙ <WH8104> unto me and keep מִצְוֹתַ֔י <WH4687> my commandments וַעֲשִׂיתֶ֖ם <WH6213> and do אֹתָ֑ם <WH853> אִם־ <WH518> though יִהְיֶ֨ה <WH1961> become נִֽדַּחֲכֶ֜ם <WH5080> them though there were of you cast out בִּקְצֵ֤ה <WH7097> unto the uttermost part הַשָּׁמַ֙יִם֙ <WH8064> of the heaven מִשָּׁ֣ם <WH8033> there אֲקַבְּצֵ֔ם <WH6908> [yet] will I gather [וַהֲבֹואֹתִים כ] (וַהֲבִֽיאֹותִים֙ <WH935> abide ק) אֶל־ <WH413> to הַמָּק֔וֹם <WH4725> them unto the place אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> I בָּחַ֔רְתִּי <WH977> that I have chosen לְשַׁכֵּ֥ן <WH7931> to set אֶת־ <WH853> שְׁמִ֖י <WH8034> my name שָֽׁם׃ <WH8033> there

וְהֵ֥ם <WH1992> They עֲבָדֶ֖יךָ <WH5650> Now these [are] thy servants וְעַמֶּ֑ךָ <WH5971> and thy people אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> whom פָּדִ֙יתָ֙ <WH6299> whom thou hast redeemed בְּכֹחֲךָ֣ <WH3581> power הַגָּד֔וֹל <WH1419> by thy great וּבְיָדְךָ֖ <WH3027> hand הַחֲזָקָֽה׃ <WH2389> and by thy strong

אָנָּ֣א <WH577> I beseech אֲדֹנָ֗י <WH136> O Lord תְּהִ֣י <WH1961> become נָ֣א <WH4994> You אָזְנְךָֽ־ <WH241> thee let now thine ear קַ֠שֶּׁבֶת <WH7183> be attentive אֶל־ <WH413> to תְּפִלַּ֨ת <WH8605> to the prayer עַבְדְּךָ֜ <WH5650> of thy servant וְאֶל־ <WH413> and to תְּפִלַּ֣ת <WH8605> and to the prayer עֲבָדֶ֗יךָ <WH5650> of thy servants הַֽחֲפֵצִים֙ <WH2655> who desire לְיִרְאָ֣ה <WH3372> to fear אֶת־ <WH853> שְׁמֶ֔ךָ <WH8034> thy name וְהַצְלִֽיחָה־ <WH6743> and prosper נָּ֤א <WH4994> I beseech thee לְעַבְדְּךָ֙ <WH5650> I pray thee thy servant הַיּ֔וֹם <WH3117> this day וּתְנֵ֣הוּ <WH5414> and grant לְרַחֲמִ֔ים <WH7356> him mercy לִפְנֵ֖י <WH6440> in the sight הָאִ֣ישׁ <WH376> of this man הַזֶּ֑ה <WH2088> this וַאֲנִ֛י <WH589> I הָיִ֥יתִי <WH1961> become מַשְׁקֶ֖ה <WH4945> was the cupbearer לַמֶּֽלֶךְ׃ <WH4428> For I was the king's פ
